mapper.select: SELECT id, written_date, writer_id, diary_title, details FROM diaries
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diaries (id, written_date, writer_id,diary_title, details) VALUES (#{id}, #{writtenDate}, #{writerId}, #{diaryTitle}, #{details});
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT d.id, d.written_date, d.diary_title, u.first_name, u.last_name, u.color, u.initial FROM members m JOIN team_diary td ON td.team_id = m.team_id JOIN diaries d ON d.id = td.diary_id JOIN users u ON u.id = d.writer_id WHERE m.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 0;
